Title: Tokyo Vice
Description: ['One night at a rock concert, a mysterious man dies while leaving a floppy disc with a member of the Rutz Detective Agency. Soon they realize the disk contains information about a deadly new weapon under development. The heroes become involved in a game of political subterfuge and military espionage, hot on the trail of the killer!']
Staff: [['Yamasaki, Osamu', 'Director'], ['Honda, Yasunori', 'Sound Director'], ['Funayama, Motoki', 'Theme Song Arrangement'], ['Oobari, Masami', 'Key Animation']]
